GK16jgrasg1u:1: smṛtāpi taruṇātapaṃ karuṇayā harantī nṛṇām abhaṅguratanutviṣāṃ valayitā śatair vidyutām/
GK16jgrasg1u:3: śrīmajjñāneṃdrabhikṣor adhigatasakalabrahmavidyāprapañcaḥ kāṇādīrākṣapādīr api gahanagiro yo mahendrādavedīt/
GK16jgrasg1u:4: devādevādhyagīṣṭa smaraharanagare śāsanaṃ jaiminīyaṃ śeṣāṅkaprāptaśeṣāmalabhaṇitir abhūt sarvavidyādharo
GK16jgrasg1u:5: pāṣāṇād api pīyūṣaṃ syandate yasya līlayā/
GK16jgrasg1u:8: nimagnena kleśair mananajaladher antarudaraṃ mayonnīto loke lalitarasagaṅgādharamaṇiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:9: harann antardhvāntaṃ hṛdayam adhirūḍho guṇavatām alaṃkārān sarvān api galitagarvān racayatu//
GK16jgrasg1u:10: pariṣkurvantv arthān sahṛdayadhurīṇāḥ katipaye tathāpi kleśo me katham api gatārtho na bhavitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:11: timīndrāḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ vidadhatu payodheḥ punar ime kim etenāyāso bhavati viphalo mandaragireḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:12: nirmāya nūtanam udāharaṇānurūpaṃ kāvyaṃ mayātra nihitaṃ na parasya kiṃcit/
GK16jgrasg1u:13: kiṃ sevyate sumanasāṃ manasāpi gandhaḥ kastūrikājananaśaktibhṛtā mṛgeṇā//
GK16jgrasg1u:14: mananataritīrṇavidyārṇavo jagannāthapaṇḍitanarendraḥ rasagaṅgādharanāmnīṃ karoti kutukena kāvyamīmāṃsām rasāgaṅgādharanāmā saṃdarbho 'yaṃ ciraṃ jayatu/
GK16jgrasg1u:15: kiṃ ca kulāni kavīnāṃ nisargasamyañci rañjayatu//
GK16jgrasg1u:16_0: tatra kīrtiparamāhlādagururājadevatāprasādādyanekaprayojanakasya kāvyasya vyutpatteḥ kavisahṛdayayor āvaśyakatayā guṇālaṃkārādibhir
GK16jgrasg1u:16_1: nirūpaṇīye tasmin viśeṣyatāvacchedakaṃ taditarabhedabuddhau sādhanaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ tāvan nirūpyate--
GK16jgrasg1u:18_0: ramaṇīyatā ca lokottarāhlādajanakajñānagocaratā / lokottaratvaṃ cāhlādagataś camatkāratvāparaparyāyo 'nubhavasākṣiko jātiviśeṣaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:18_1: kāraṇāṃ ca tadavacchinne bhāvanāviśeṣaḥ punaḥpunar anusaṃdhānātmā / “putras te
GK16jgrasg1u:19: jātaḥ,” “dhanaṃ te dāsyāmi” iti vākyārthadhījanyasyāhlādasya na
GK16jgrasg1u:20: lokottaratvam/ ato na tasmin vākye kāvyatvaprasaktiḥ/ itthaṃ ca camatkārajanakabhāvanāviṣayārthapratipādakaśabdatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:21_1: camatkāratvavattvam eva vā kāvyatvam iti phalitam / yat tu prāñcaḥ “adoṣau
GK16jgrasg1u:22: saguṇau sālaṃkārau śabdārthau kāvyam” ity āhuḥ, tatra vicāryate--
GK16jgrasg1u:23: śabdārthayugalaṃ na kāvyaśabdavācyam, mānābhāvāt/ kāvyam uccaiḥ paṭhyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:24: kāvyād artho 'vagamyate, kavyaṃ śrutam artho na jñātaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:25: ityādiviśvajanīnavyavahārataḥ pratyuta śabdaviśeṣasyaiva kāvyapadārthatvapratipatteś ca/ vyavahāraḥ śabdamātre lakṣaṇayopapādanīya
GK16jgrasg1u:26: iti cet, syād apy evam, yadi kāvyapadārthatayā parābhimate śabdārthayugale kāvyaśabdaśakteḥ pramāpakaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ kim api pramāṇāṃ syāt/ tad eva tu
GK16jgrasg1u:27: na paśyāmaḥ/ vimatavākyaṃ tv aśraddheyam eva/ itthaṃ cāsati kāvyaśabdasya
GK16jgrasg1u:28_0: śabdārthayugalaśaktigrāhake pramāṇe, prāg uktād vyavahārataḥ śabdaviśeṣe siddhyantīṃ śaktiṃ ko nāma nivārayitum īṣṭe / etena
GK16jgrasg1u:28_1: vinigamanābhāvād ubhayatra śaktir iti pratyuktam / tadevaṃ śabdaviśeṣasyaiva kāvyapadārthatve siddhe tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:28_2: yuktam, na tu svakalpitasya kāvyapadārthasya / eṣaiva ca vedapurāṇādilakṣaṇeṣv api gatiḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:29: anyathā tatrāpīyaṃ duravasthā syāt/ yat tv āsvādodbodhakatvam eva kāvyatvaprayojakaṃ tacca śabde cārthe cāviśiṣṭam ity āhuḥ, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:31: lakṣaṇīyatvāpatteḥ/ kiṃ bahunā nāṭyāṅgānāṃ sarveṣām api prāyaśas
GK16jgrasg1u:32: tathātvena tatvāpāttir durvāraiva/ etena rasodbodhasamarthasyaivātra lakṣyatvam ity api parāstam/ api ca kāvyapadapravṛttinimittaṃ śabdārthayor
GK16jgrasg1u:33_0: vyāsaktam, pratyekaparyāptaṃ vā / nādyaḥ / eko na dvāv iti vyavahārasyeva ślokavākyaṃ na kāvyam iti vyavahārasyāpatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:33_1: na dvitīyaḥ / ekasmin padye kāvyadvayavyavahārāpatteḥ / tasmād vedaśāstrapurāṇalakṣaṇasyeva kāvyalakṣaṇasyāpi śabdaniṣṭhataivocitā /
GK16jgrasg1u:34: lakṣaṇe guṇālaṅkārādiniveśo 'pi na yuktaḥ/ “uditaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vidhoḥ” iti kāvye dūtyabhisārikāvirahiṇyādisamudīrite
GK16jgrasg1u:36_0: cāvyāptyāpatteḥ / na cedam akāvyam iti śakyaṃ vaditum / kāvyatayā parābhimatasyāpi yathā vaktuṃ śakyatvāt / kāvyajīvitaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:36_1: camatkāritvaṃ cāviśiṣṭam eva / guṇatvālaṅkāratvāder ananugamāc ca / duṣṭa kāvyam iti
GK16jgrasg1u:37: vyavahārasya bādhakaṃ vinā lākṣaṇikatvāyogāc ca/ na ca saṃyogābhāvavān
GK16jgrasg1u:38_0: vṛkṣaḥ saṃyogītivad aṃśabhedena / doṣarahitaṃ duṣṭam iti vyavahāre bādhakaṃ nāstīti vācyam / “mūle mahīrūho vihaṃgamasaṃyogī,
GK16jgrasg1u:38_1: na śākhāyām” iti pratīter ivedaṃ padyaṃ pūrvārdhe kāvyam uttarārdhe tu na kāvyam iti svarasavāhino viśvajanīnānubhavasya
GK16jgrasg1u:39_0: śauryādivadātmadharmāṇāṃ guṇānām, hārādivad upaskārakāṇām alaṃkārāṇāṃ ca śarīraghaṭakatvānupapatteś ca / yat tu “rasavad
GK16jgrasg1u:39_1: eva kāvyam” iti sāhityadarpaṇe nirṇītam, tan na / vastvalaṃkārapradhānānāṃ kāvyānām akāvyatvāpatteḥ / na ceṣṭāpattiḥ, mahākavisaṃpradāyasyākulībhāvaprasaṅgāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:40_0: tathā ca jalapravāhaveganipatanotpatanabhramaṇāni kavibhir varṇitāni kapibālādivilasitāni ca / na ca tatrāpi yathākathaṃcit
GK16jgrasg1u:40_1: paramparayā rasasparśo 'sty eveti vācyam / īdṛśarasasparśasya “gauś calati”, “mṛgo
GK16jgrasg1u:41_0: dhāvati” ityādāv atiprasaktatvenāprayojakatvāt / arthamātrasya vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāryanyatamatvād iti dik / tasya ca kāraṇaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:41_1: kavigatā kevalā pratibhā / sā ca kāvyaghaṭanānukūlaśabdārthopasthitiḥ / tadgataṃ ca pratibhātvaṃ kāvyakāraṇatāvacchedakatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:41_2: siddho jātiviśeṣa upādhirūpaṃ vākhaṇḍam / tasyāś ca hetuḥ kvacid devatāmahāpuruṣaprasādādijanyam adṛṣṭam /
GK16jgrasg1u:42: kvacic ca vilakṣaṇavyutpattikāvyakaraṇābhyāsau/ na tu trayam eva/ bālādes tau vināpi kevalān mahāpuruṣaprasādād api pratibhotpatteḥ/ na tatra tayor
GK16jgrasg1u:43: janmāntarīyayoḥ kalpanaṃ vācyam/ gauravān mānābhāvāt kāryasyānyathāpy
GK16jgrasg1u:44: upapatteś ca/ loke hi balavatā pramāṇenāgamādinā sati kāraṇātānirṇāye
GK16jgrasg1u:45: paścād upasthitasya vyabhicārasya vāraṇāya janmāntarīyam anyathānupapattyā kāraṇaṃ dharmādharmādi kalpyate/ anyathā tu vyabhicāropasthityā
GK16jgrasg1u:46: pūrvavṛttakāraṇatānirṇāye bhramatvapratipattir eva jāyate/ nāpi kevalam adṛṣṭam eva kāraṇam ity api śakyaṃ vaditum/ kiyantaṃcit kālaṃ kāvyaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:47: kartum aśaknuvataḥ katham api saṃjātayor vyutpattyabhyāsayoḥ pratibhāyāḥ prādurbhāvasya darśanāt/ tatrāpy adṛṣṭasyāṅgīkāre prāg api tābhyāṃ tasyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:48_0: prasakteḥ / na ca tatra pratibhāyāḥ pratibandhakam adṛṣṭāntaraṃ kalpyam iti vācyam / tādṛśāneka sthalagatādṛṣṭadvayakalpanāpekṣayā
GK16jgrasg1u:48_1: kḷptavyutpattyabhyāsayor eva pratibhāhetutvakalpane lāghavāt / ataḥ prāguktasaraṇir eva jyāyasī / tādṛśādṛṣṭasya tādṛśavyutpattyabhyāsayoś
GK16jgrasg1u:49: pratibhāgataṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryatāvacchedakam, ato na vyabhicāraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:50_0: pratibhātvaṃ ca kavitāyāḥ kāraṇātāvacchedakaṃ, pratibhāgatavailakṣaṇyam eva vā vilakṣaṇakāvyaṃ pratīti nātrāpi saḥ / na ca
GK16jgrasg1u:50_1: sator api vyutpatyabhyāsayor yatra na pratibhotpattis tatrānvayavyabhicāra iti
GK16jgrasg1u:52: kāraṇatāvacchedakānavacchinnatvāt/ pāpaviśeṣasya tatra pratibandhakatvakalpanād vā na doṣaḥ/ pratibandhakābhāvasya ca kāraṇatā
GK16jgrasg1u:54: prativādinā mantrādibhiḥ kṛte katipayadivasavyāpini vākstambhe vihitānekaprabandhasyāpi kaveḥ kāvyānudayasya darśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:56: śabdārthau yatra guṇībhāvitātmānau kamapyartham abhivyaṅktas tad ādyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:58: aparāṅgavācyasiddhyaṅgavyaṅgyasyāpi camatkāritayā tadvāraṇāya guṇībhāvitātmānāv iti svāpekṣayā
GK16jgrasg1u:62_0: atrālambanasya nāyakasya, savidhaśayanākṣiptasya rahaḥsthānāder uddīpanasya ca vibhāvasya, tādṛśanirīkṣaṇāder anubhāvasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:62_1: trapautsukyādeś ca vyabhicāriṇaḥ, saṃyogād ratir abhivyajyate / ālambanādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyate / na ca yady ayaṃ śayitaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:63_0: nāyikecchāyā eva vyaṅgayatvam atreti vācyam / manorathān saphalīkartum asamarthetyanena manorathāḥ sarve 'syā hṛdi tiṣṭanti
GK16jgrasg1u:63_1: iti pratīteḥ svaśabdena manorathapadena sāmānyākāreṇa tādṛśecchāyā api nivedanāt / na ca manorathapadena manorathatvākāreṇā
GK16jgrasg1u:63_2: sāmānyecchāyā abhidhāne 'pi cumbeyam iti viṣayaviśeṣaviśiṣṭecchātvena vyaṅgyatve kiṃ bādhakam iti vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:64: camatkāro na syād ityasyaiva bādhakatvāt/ na hi viśeṣākāreṇa vyaṅgyo 'pi
GK16jgrasg1u:66_0: katham api vācyavṛttyanāliṅgitasyaiva vyaṅgyasya camatkāritvenālaṃkārikaiḥ svīkārāt / cumbanecchāyā ratyanubhāvatayaiva sundaratvena
GK16jgrasg1u:66_1: tadavyañjane cumbāmīti śabdabalāc cumbanecchāvad acamatkāritvāc ca / evaṃ trapāyā api na prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvam / anuvādyatāvacchedakatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:68: vidheyam iti nānuvādyatāvacchedakatvaṃ tasyā iti vācyam/ evam api nayanagatadaramīlanasya tatkāryatve 'pi
GK16jgrasg1u:69: daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇasya ratimātrakāryatvāt/ trapāyā eva mukhyatvena vyaṅgyatve nirīkṣaṇokter anatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:70: vācyavṛttyā rater anubhāve nirīkṣaṇo trapāyā anubhāvasya daramīlanasyeva vyañjanayā tasyāṃ tasyā api guṇībhāvapratyayaucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:72: gurumadhyagatā mayā natāṅgī nihatā nīrajakorakeṇa mandam/
GK16jgrasg1u:74: atra ghūrṇitāsīd ityanenāsamīkṣyakārin kimidam anucitaṃ kṛtavān asīty arthasamvalito 'marṣaś carvaṇāviśrāntidhāmatvāt prādhānyena vyajyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:77: “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ śvāsāsaṅga na yā sehe/
GK16jgrasg1u:78: samprati sā hṛdayagataṃ priyapāṇiṃ mandam ākṣipati//”
GK16jgrasg1u:79_0: idaṃ ca padyaṃ mannirmitaprabandhagatatvena pūrvasākāṅkṣam iti diṅmātreṇa vyākhyāyate --- yā navavadhūḥ palyaṅkaśayitā śvāsasyāsaṅgamātreṇāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:80_0: pravatsyatpatikā priyeṇa saśaṅkena samarpitaṃ hṛdi pāṇiṃ navavadhūjātisvābhāvyād ākṣipati, paraṃ tu mandam / atra śanaiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:80_1: svasthānaprāpaṇātmanā mandākṣepeṇa ratyākhyaḥ sthāyī saṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyate / upapādayiṣyate ca sthāyyādīnām api saṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgayatvam /
GK16jgrasg1u:81: amum eva ca prabhedaṃ dhvanim āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:82: yat tu citramīmāṃsāyām appayyadīkṣitaiḥ “niḥśeṣacyutacandanam” iti padyaṃ dhvanyudāharaṇaprasaṅge vyākhyātam-- uttarīyakarṣaṇena candana-cyutir
GK16jgrasg1u:83: ityanyathāsiddhiparihārāya niḥśeṣagrahaṇam/ tataś candanacyuteḥ snānasādhāraṇyavyāvartanena saṃbhogacihnoddhāṭanāya taṭagrahaṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:84: snāne hi sarvatra candana cyutiḥ syāt, tava tu stanayos taṭa upari bhāga
GK16jgrasg1u:85_0: eva dṛśyate / iyam āśleṣakṛtaiva / tathā nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dhara ity atra tāmbūlagrahaṇavilambāt prācīnarāgasya kiṃcin mṛṣṭatety
GK16jgrasg1u:85_1: anyathāsiddhiparihārāya nirmṛṣṭarāga iti rāgasya niḥśeṣamṛṣṭatoktā / punaḥ snānasādhāraṇyavartanena saṃbhogacihnodghāṭanāyādhara
GK16jgrasg1u:85_2: iti viśiṣya grahaṇam / uttaroṣṭhe sarāge 'dharoṣṭhamātrasya nirmṛṣṭarāgatā cumbanakṛtaiva ityādinā, “idam api dhvaner udāharaṇam”
GK16jgrasg1u:87: āśleṣacumbanādīnāṃ pratipādanena pradhānavyaṅgyavyañjane sāhāyakam ācaranti iti, tad etad
GK16jgrasg1u:90: upāttāni tāni kāraṇāntarato 'pi bhavanti/ yataś cātraiva snānakāryatvenopāttānīti nopabhoga eva pratibaddhānīty anaikāntikāni iti
GK16jgrasg1u:92: “bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mālido teṇa/
GK16jgrasg1u:94_0: ityādau liṅgajaliṅgijñānarūpeṇānumānena vyaktiṃ gatārthayato vyaktivivekakṛto mataṃ pratyācakṣāṇena vyabhicāritvenāsiddhatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:94_1: ca saṃdihyamānād api liṅgād vyañjanam abhyupagatam / ittham eva ca
GK16jgrasg1u:95_0: dhvanikṛtāpi prathamoddyote / evaṃ ca vyañjakānāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatāṃ prāmāṇikānāṃ granthaiḥ sahāsādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatas
GK16jgrasg1u:95_1: tava granthasya virodhaḥ sphuṭaḥ / kiṃ ca yad idaṃ niḥśeṣetyādyavāntaravākyārthānāṃ vāpīsnānavyāvṛttidvāreṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:96: vyaṅgyāsādhāraṇyaṃ saṃpādyate tat kim artham iti pṛcchāmaḥ/ vyaṅgyasya vyañjanārtham iti cen na/ vyañjakagatāsādhāraṇyasya vyañjanānupāyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:97: “auṇiddaṃ dobballaṃ cintā alasaṃtaṇaṃ saṇīsasiam maha mandabhāiṇīe keraṃ sahi tuha paribhavai//”
GK16jgrasg1u:98_0: ityādau sādhāraṇānām evaunnidryādīnāṃ vaktrādivaiśiṣṭyavaśād arthaviśeṣavyañjakatāyā abhyupagateḥ / pratyutāsādhāraṇyasya
GK16jgrasg1u:98_1: vyāptyaparaparyāyasyānumānānukūlatayā vyaktipratikūlatvāc ca / atha taṭādighaṭitatve 'pi na niḥśeṣetyādivākyārthānām asādhāraṇyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:99_0: salilārdravasanakaraṇakaproñchanādināpi tatsambhavād iti cet tarhi vāpīsnānavyāvartanena kaḥ puruṣārthaḥ / ekatrānaikāntikatvasyeva
GK16jgrasg1u:99_1: bahuṣv anaikāntikatāyā api jñātāyā anumitipratikūlatvād vyaktyapratikūlatvāc ca /
GK16jgrasg1u:100: api cātra hi tadantikam eva rantuṃ gatāsīti vyaṅgyaśarīre tadantikagamanaṃ ramaṇarūpaphalāṃśaś ceti dvayaṃ ghaṭakam/ tatra tāvat tadantikaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:101_0: gatāsītyaṃśasya tvanmate vyaṅgyatvaṃ durupapādam / tvaduktarītyā viśeṣaṇavākyārthānāṃ niḥśeṣetyādipratipādyānāṃ vācyārthe
GK16jgrasg1u:101_1: vāpīsnāne bādhitatvād vācyakakṣāgatapradhānavākyārthībhūtavidhiniṣedhapratipādakābhyāṃ gatā na gateti śabdābhyāṃ virodhilakṣaṇayā
GK16jgrasg1u:101_2: niṣedhasya vidheś ca pratīter upapatteḥ / na hi mukhyārthabādhenonmīlite 'rthe vyaktivedyatocitā / yathā

GK16jgrasg1u:605_0: vicchedānarhe ca vicchedaḥ / yathā sandhyāvandanadevayajanādidharmavarṇane prasakte kayāpi kāminyā saha kasyacitkāmukasyānurāgavarṇane /

GK16jgrasg1u:614: tāmbūlacarvaṇam, dāropasaṃgraḥ/ bālavṛddhayoḥ strīsevanam, yūnaś ca virāgaḥ/ daridrāṇām āḍhyācaraṇam, āḍhyānāṃ ca daridrācāraḥ/ prakṛtayo
GK16jgrasg1u:616_1: ca / tatra ratyādīnāṃ bhayātiriktasthāyibhāvānāṃ sarvatra samatve 'pi rateḥ saṃbhogarupāyā manuṣyeṣv ivottamadevatāsu sphuṭīkṛtasakalānubhāvavarṇanam
GK16jgrasg1u:617_0: krodhasya ca lokabhasmīkaraṇapaṭor dinarātrivyatyayādyanekāścaryakāriṇo divyeṣv ivādivyeṣu / ālambanagatārādhyatvasyānubhāvagatamithyātvasya
GK16jgrasg1u:617_1: ca pratītyā rasānullāsāpatteḥ / na ca sādhāraṇīkaraṇād
GK16jgrasg1u:618: ārādhyatvajñānānutpattir iti vācyam/ yatra sahṛdayānāṃ rasodbodhaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:619: pramāṇasiddhas tatraiva sādhāraṇīkaraṇasya kalpanāt/ anyathā svamātṛviṣayakasvapitṛrativarṇane 'pi sahṛdayasya rasodbodhāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:621: samayo madonmattamataṅgajair iva bhinna iti ca tannidarśanenedānīṃtanena tathā varṇayituṃ sāṃpratam/ tathā vidyāvayovarṇāśramatapobhir utkṛṣṭaiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:622_0: svato 'pakṛṣṭeṣu na sabahumānena vacasā vyavahartavyam / vyavahartavyaṃ cāpakṛṣṭair utkṛṣṭeṣu / tatrāpi tatrabhavan bhagavann
GK16jgrasg1u:622_1: ityādibhiḥ saṃbodhanair munigurudevatāprabhṛtaya eva na rājādayaḥ, jātyottamair dvijair eva, nādhamaiḥ śūdrādibhiḥ, parameśvaretyādisaṃbodhanaiś
GK16jgrasg1u:626: yāvatā tv anaucityena rasasya puṣṭis tāvat tu na vāryate,
GK16jgrasg1u:628: “brahmann adhyayanasya naiṣa samayas tūṣṇīṃ bahiḥ sthīyatāṃ svalpaṃ jalpa bṛhaspate jaḍamate naiṣā sabhā vajriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:629: vīṇāṃ saṃhara nārada stutikathālāpair alaṃ tumburo sītārallakabhallabhagnahṛdayaḥ svastho na laṅkeśvaraḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:630_1: brahmādyadhikṣepaparasyānaucityaṃ na doṣaḥ / evam eva “ale le saddaḥsamuppāḍia hariyakusaggaṃthimayācchamālāpai
GK16jgrasg1u:632: reśabdādiprayogasya tattathā, hāsyānuguṇatvāt/ eṣā hi digupadarśitā/ anayā sudhībhir anyad apy ūhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:633: raseṣu caiteṣu nigaditeṣu mādhuryaujaḥprasādākhyāṃs trīn guṇān āhuḥ/ tatra
GK16jgrasg1u:634: “śṛṅgāre saṃyogākhye yanmādhuryaṃ tato 'tiśayitaṃ karuṇe, tābhyāṃ vipralambhe , tebhyo 'pi śānte/ uttarottaram atiśayitāyāś cittadruter
GK16jgrasg1u:635: jananāt/ saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇaśāntayos tābhyām api vipralambhe” ity
GK16jgrasg1u:636: apare/ saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇavipralambhaśānteṣv atiśayitam eva na punas
GK16jgrasg1u:637: tatrāpi tāratamyam” ity anye/ tatra prathamacaramayor matayoḥ “karuṇe
GK16jgrasg1u:638: vipralambhe tacchānte cātiśayānvitam” iti prācāṃ sūtram anukūlam/
GK16jgrasg1u:639_0: tasyottarasūtragatasya krameṇeti padasyāpakarṣānapakarṣābhyāṃ vyākhyādvayasya saṃbhavāt / madhyasthe tu mate karuṇaśāntābhyāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:639_1: vipralambhasya mādhuryātiśaye yadi sahṛdayānām anubhavo 'sti sākṣī tadā sa
GK16jgrasg1u:641: vīrabībhatsaraudreṣv ojaso yathottaram atiśayaḥ, uttarottaram atiśayitāyāś cittadīpter jananāt/ adbhutahāsyabhayānakānāṃ guṇadvayayogitvaṃ kecid
GK16jgrasg1u:642: icchanti/ apare tu prasādamātram/ prasādas tu sarveṣu raseṣu sarvāsu racanāsu ca sādhāraṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:643: guṇānāṃ caiṣāṃ drutidīptivikāsākhyās tisraś cittavṛttayaḥ krameṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:644: prayojyāḥ/ tattadguṇaviśiṣṭarasacarvaṇājanyā iti yāvat/ evam eteṣu guṇeṣu
GK16jgrasg1u:645: rasamātradharmeṣu vyavasiteṣu madhurā racanā, ojasvī bandha ity ādayo vyavahārā ākāro 'sya
GK16jgrasg1u:646: śūra ity ādivyavahāravad aupacārikā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:647: ye 'mī mādhuryaujaḥ prasādārasamātradharmatayoktās teṣāṃ rasadharmatve kiṃ mānam? pratyakṣam eveti cet, na/ dāhādeḥ kāryād analagatasyoṣṇasparśasya
GK16jgrasg1u:648_0: yathā bhinnatayānubhavas tathā drutyādicittavṛttibhyo rasakāryebhyo 'nyeṣāṃ rasagataguṇānām ananubhavāt / tādṛśaguṇaviśiṣṭarasānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:648_1: drutyādikāraṇatvāt kāraṇatāvacchedakatayā guṇānām anumānam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:650_0: śṛṅgārakaruṇaśāntānāṃ mādhuryavattvena drutikāraṇatvaṃ, prātisvikarūpeṇa kāraṇatvakalpanāpekṣayā laghubhūtam iti tu na vācyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:650_1: pareṇa madhuratarādiguṇānāṃ pṛthag drutataratvādi kāryatāratamyaprayojakatayābhyupagamena mādhuryavattvena kāraṇatāyā
GK16jgrasg1u:651: gaḍubhūtatvāt/ itthaṃ ca prātisvikarūpeṇaiva kāraṇatve lāghavam/
GK16jgrasg1u:652_0: kiṃ cātmano nirguṇatayātmarūparasaguṇatvaṃ mādhuryādīnām anupapannam / evaṃ tadupādhiratyādiguṇatvam api, mānābhāvāt, pararītyā
GK16jgrasg1u:652_1: guṇe guṇāntarasyānaucityāc ca / atha śṛṅgāro madhura ity ādivyavahāraḥ katham
GK16jgrasg1u:654: prayojakatāsaṃbandhena drutyādikam eva vā mādhuryādikam astu/ vyavahāras tu vājigandhoṣṇetivyavahāravad
GK16jgrasg1u:656: ato na vyavahārātiprasaktiḥ/ tathā ca śabdārthayor api mādhuryāder īdṛśasya sattvād upacāro naiva kalpya iti tu mādṛśāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:660: iti daśā śabdaguṇān, daśaiva cārthaguṇān āmananti/ nāmāni punas tāny eva,
GK16jgrasg1u:663: śabdānāṃ bhinnānām apy ekatvapratibhānaprayojakaḥ saṃhitayaikajātīyavarṇavinyāsaviśeṣo gāḍhatvāparaparyāyaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:669: “kiṃ brūmas tava vīratāṃ vayam amī, yasmin dharākhaṇḍala-
GK16jgrasg1u:672: atra yasminn ityantaṃ śaithilyam, bhruśabdāntaṃ gāḍhatvam, punar nayanetyantaṃ prathamam ityādi
GK16jgrasg1u:678: yadi komalatā tavāṅgakānām atha kā nāma kathāpi pallavānām//”
GK16jgrasg1u:682: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:683: atra pūrvārdhe/ uttarārdhe tu mādhuryam api/
GK16jgrasg1u:692: udāharanti ca “svacaraṇaviniviṣṭair nūpurair nartakīnāṃ jhaṭiti raṇitam
GK16jgrasg1u:693: āsīt” ityādi/ tatra teṣām etādṛśīṃ vikaṭatvalakṣaṇām udāratām ojasy
GK16jgrasg1u:694: antarbhāvayan kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ katham anukūla iti ta eva jānanti/ na hy atraujaso vaipulyena pratibhānam asti/
GK16jgrasg1u:695: “viniviṣṭair nūpurair narta-” ity atra sannapy ojaso lavo na camatkārī/
GK16jgrasg1u:696: nāpi tatra nṛtyatprāyatvaṃ varṇānām anubhavanti sahṛdayāḥ/ aṃśāntare tu mādhuryam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:701: tṛṣṇātāmyadamandatāpasakulaiḥ sānandam ālokitā bhūmībhūṣaṇa bhūṣayanti bhūvanābhogaṃ bhavatkīrtayaḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:702: yathā vā “ayaṃ patatu nirdayam” ityādiprāg udāhṛte/
GK16jgrasg1u:703: avidagdhavaidikādiprayogayogyānāṃ padānāṃ parihāreṇa prayujyamāneṣu padeṣu lokottaraśobhārūpam aujjvalyaṃ kāntiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:706: anayor eva prācīnair ārohāvarohavyapadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ/ krama eva hi tayoḥ prasādād asya bhedakaḥ/ tatra hi tayor vyutkrameṇa vṛtteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:710: atrārohaḥ prathame 'rdhe/ tṛtīyacaraṇe tv avarohaḥ/ gaṅgety ādau mādhuryasya vyañjakeṣu varṇeṣu satsv api dīrghasamāsāntaḥpātitayāna tasya
GK16jgrasg1u:711: prarohaḥ/ uttarārdhe tu so 'pi/ ete daśa śabdaguṇāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:712: evaṃ kriyāparamparayā vidagdhaceṣṭitasya tadasphuṭatvasya tadupapādakayukteś ca sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ saṃsargaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:714: yathā-- “kamalānukāri vadanaṃ kila tasyāḥ” ityādi/ pratyudāharaṇaṃ tu “kamalakāntyanukāri vaktram” ityādi /
GK16jgrasg1u:718: hariṃ sarvatra paśyāmi harer anyan na bhāti me//”
GK16jgrasg1u:719: atra viṣṇur bhrātety ādinirmāṇe prakramabhaṅgātmakaṃ vaiṣamyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:720: ekasyā evokter bhaṅgyantareṇa punaḥ kathanātmakam uktivaicitryaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:723: “vidhattāṃ niḥśaṅkaṃ niravadhisamādhiṃ vidhir aho sukhaṃ śeṣe śetāṃ harir avīrataṃ nṛtyatu
GK16jgrasg1u:724: kṛtaṃ prāyaścittair alam atha tapodānayajanaiḥ savitrī kāmānāṃ yadi jagati jāgarti bhavatī//”
GK16jgrasg1u:725: atra vidhyādibhir nāsti kim api prayojanam ity eṣo 'rthaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:730: “priyāmaraṇakātaraḥ” ity atra tu śokadāyino maraṇaśabdasya sattvāt
GK16jgrasg1u:737: “cumbanaṃ dehi me bhārye kāmacāṇḍālatṛptaye” ity ādigrāmyārthaparihāra udāratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:738: ekasya padārthasya bahubhiḥ padair abhidhānaṃ, bahūnāṃ caikena,
GK16jgrasg1u:744: prauḍhir vyāsasamāsau ca sābhiprāyatvam asya ca// iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:745: pūrvārdhapratipādyaṃ dvayaṃ vyāsasamāsau ceti catuṣprakārā prauḍhiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:746: sābhiprāyatvaṃ ceti pañcaprakāram oja ity arthaḥ/ prauḍhiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:751: paramapuruṣavaktrād udgatānāṃ narāṇāṃ madhumadhuragirāṃ ca prādurāsīd vinodaḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:756: atra “yasyāḥ parāṅganāgehāt patiḥ prātargṛhe 'ñcati” iti vākyārthe khaṇḍitāpadābhidhānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:757: “ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaś ca na yacchati/
GK16jgrasg1u:758: sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhir ucchṛṅkhalo nṛṇām//”
GK16jgrasg1u:759: atra daivādhīnaṃ sarvam ity ekasmin vākyārthe nānāvākyaracanātmako vyāsapadavācyo vistaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:763: “tadanantaraṃ vāsudeve parabrahmaṇi manaḥ prāveśayat”, “tataś ca mukto 'bhūd” iti vākyārthakalāpaḥ śatṛ-ktvā-bahuvrīhibhis tiṅantena
GK16jgrasg1u:769: atropekṣābhāve karuṇāmūrtitvaṃ poṣakam/ pāpiṣṭhavāt karuṇāyā abhāve
GK16jgrasg1u:770: prakṛte 'syāḥ saṃpādanāya gaṇikety ādi sīdann iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:772: tac ca sphuṭapratīyamānarasatvam/ udāharaṇaṃ ca varṇitam eva
GK16jgrasg1u:774: avarṇitapūrvo 'yam arthaḥ pūrvavarṇitacchāyo veti kaver ālocanaṃ samādhiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:776: ādyo yathā-- “tanayamainākagaveṣaṇa” ityādau, dvitīyas tu prāyaśaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:777: sarvatraivety āhuḥ/ apare tv eṣu guṇeṣu katipayān prāguktais tribhir guṇair vakṣyamāṇadoṣābhāvālaṃkāraiś ca gatārthayantaḥ kāṃścid
GK16jgrasg1u:778: vaicitryamātrarūpatayā, kvacid doṣatayā ca manyamānā na tāvataḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:779_0: svīkurvanti / tathā hi-- śleṣodāratāprasādasamādhīnām ojovyañjakaghaṭanāyām antarbhāvaḥ / na ca śleṣodāratayoḥ sarvāṃśe gāḍhabandhātmanor
GK16jgrasg1u:779_1: ojovyañjakaghaṭanāntarbhāvo 'stu nāma, prasādasamādhyos tu gāḍhaśithilātmanor aṃśenaujovyañjakāntarbhāve 'py aṃśāntareṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:779_2: kutrāntarbhāva iti vācyam / mādhuryābhivyañjake prasādābhivyañjake veti
GK16jgrasg1u:780: suvacatvāt/ mādhuryaṃ tu pareṣām asmadabhyupagatamādhuryavyañjakam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:781: evaṃ ca sarvatra vyañjake vyaṅgyaśabdaprayogo bhāktaḥ/ samatā tu sarvatrānucitaiva/ pratipādyodbhaṭatvānudbhaṭatvābhyāmekasminn eva padye
GK16jgrasg1u:786: kāvyaṃ tarhi sakhe sukhena kathaya tvaṃ saṃmukhe mādṛśāṃ no ced duṣkṛtam ātmanā kṛtam iva svāntād bahir mā kṛthāḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:787: atra pūrvārdhe tṛtīyacaraṇe ca lokottaranirmāṇapratipādake yo mārgo na sa caturthacaraṇe kadaryakāvyapratipādaka iti vaiṣamyam eva guṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:788: grāmyatvakaṣṭatvayos tyāgāt kāntisaukumāryayor gatārthatā/ prasādena cārthavyakter iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:789: arthaguṇeṣv api-- śleṣaḥ ojasa ādyāś catvāro bhedāś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:790: uktivaicitryamātrarūpā iti na guṇāntarbhāvam arhanti/ anyathā pratiślokam arthavaicitryavailakṣaṇyād guṇabhedāpatteḥ/ anadhikapadatvātmā prasādaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:792: agrāmyarūpodāratā, vaiṣamyābhāvalakṣaṇā samatā, sābhiprāyatvātmakaḥ pañcama ojasaḥ prakāraḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:795: doṣāṇāṃ nirākaraṇena svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasya rasadhvanirasavadalaṃkārayoś ca svīkaraṇena ca gatārthāni/ samādhis tu kavigataḥ kāvyasya kāraṇaṃ na tu
GK16jgrasg1u:796: guṇaḥ, pratibhāyā api kāvyaguṇatvāpatteḥ/ atas traya eva guṇā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:797: tatra ṭavargavarjitānāṃ vargāṇāṃ prathamatṛtīyaiḥ śarbhir antasthaiś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:798: ghaṭitā, naikaṭyena prayuktair anusvāraparasavarṇāiḥ śuddhānunāsikaiś ca śobhitā, vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca niṣiddhaiḥ saṃyogādyair
GK16jgrasg1u:799: acumbitā, avṛttir muduvṛttirvā racanānupūrvyātmikā mādhuryasya vyañjikā/
GK16jgrasg1u:800_0: dvitīyacaturthās tu vargyā guṇasyāsya nānukūlāḥ, nāpi pratikūlāḥ, dūratayā saṃniveśitāś cet / naikaṭyena tu pratikūlā api
GK16jgrasg1u:800_1: bhavanti, yadi tadāyatto nānuprāsaḥ / anye tu vargasthānāṃ pañcānām apy aviśeṣeṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:803: tāṃ tamālatarukāntilaṅghinīṃ kiṃkarīkṛtanavāmbudatviṣam svānta me kalaya śāntaye ciraṃ naicikīnayanacumbitāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:806: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:807_0: prathame padye 'tiśayoktyalaṃkṛtasya bhagavaddhyānautsukyasya bhagavadviṣayakarater vā dhvanyamānāyāḥ śānta eva paryavasānāt
GK16jgrasg1u:807_1: tadgatamādhuryasyābhivyañjikā racaneyam / dvitīye tu smṛtyupaṣṭabdhaśṛṅgāragatasya / naikaṭyena dvitīyacaturthavargavarṇaṭavargajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyavisargasakārabahulair
GK16jgrasg1u:807_2: varṇāir ghaṭito jhayrephānyataraghaṭitasaṃyogaparahrasvaiś ca naikaṭyena prayuktair āliṅgito dīrghavṛttyātmā gumpha ojasaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:807_3: asmin patitāḥ prathamatṛtīyavargyā guṇasyāsya nānukūlā nāpi pratikūlāḥ saṃyogāghaṭakāś
GK16jgrasg1u:809: tadghaṭakās tv anukūlā eva/ evam anusvāraparasavarṇā api/ yathā-- “ayaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:810: patatu nirdayaṃ dalitadṛpta-” ity ādau prāgudāhṛte/ śrutamātrā vākyārtham karatalabadaram iva nivedayantī ghaṭanā prasādasya/ ayaṃ ca sarvasādhāraṇo
GK16jgrasg1u:811: guṇaḥ/ udāharaṇāny atra prāyaśo madīyāni sarvāṇy eva padyāni/ tathāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:814: prāṇeśaḥ praṇayākulaḥ punar asāv āstāṃ samastā kathā/
GK16jgrasg1u:815: etat tvāṃ vinivedayāmi mama ceduktiṃ hitāṃ manyase mugdhe mā kuru mānam ānanam idaṃ rākāpatir
GK16jgrasg1u:816_0: atra sarvāvacchedena prasādābhivyañjakatvam aṃśabhedena tu mādhuryaujobhivyañjakatvam api, manasijāntasya mā kurv ādeś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:816_1: mādhuryābhivyaktihetutvāt / sakhya ityāder ojogamakatvāt / nanv atra śṛṅgārāśrayasya mādhuryasyābhivyaktaye tadanukūlās tu
GK16jgrasg1u:816_2: nāma racanā, ojasas tu kaḥ prasaṅgo yad arthaṃ tadanukūlavarṇavinyāsa iti cet /
GK16jgrasg1u:817_0: nāyikāmānopaśāntaye kṛtānekayatnāyās tadīyaṃ hitam upadiśantyāḥ sakhyāḥ sakrodhatvasya vyañjanīyatayā tathāvinyāsasya sāphalyāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:817_1: kiṃ bahunā rasasyaujasvino 'marṣāder bhāvasya cāvivakṣāyām api vaktari kruddhatayā prasiddhe vācye vā krūratare ākhyāyikādau
GK16jgrasg1u:819: vācā nirmalayā sudhāmadhurayā yāṃ nātha śikṣāmadās tāṃ svapne 'pi na saṃspṛśāmy aham ahaṃbhāvāvṛto
GK16jgrasg1u:820: ity āgaḥśataśālinaṃ punar api svīyeṣu māṃ bibhratas tvatto nāsti dayānidhir yadupate matto na mattaḥ paraḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:821_0: atra guṇāntarāsamānādhikaraṇaḥ prasādaḥ / idānīṃ tattadguṇavyañjanakṣamāyā nirmiteḥ paricayāya sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca varjanīyaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:822: kiṃcid aśravyam/ yathā-- “kakubhasurabhiḥ, vitatagātraḥ, palalam ivābhāti”
GK16jgrasg1u:823: ity ādau/ asakṛc ced adhikam// yathā-- “vitatatarastarur eṣa bhāti bhūmau”/ evaṃ bhinnapadagatatve 'pi/ yathā-- “śuka karoṣi kathaṃ vijane
GK16jgrasg1u:824: rucim” ity ādau/ asakṛdbhinnapadagatatve tato 'py adhikam/ yathā-- “pika
GK16jgrasg1u:825: kakubho mukharīkuru prakāmam”/ evaṃ svasamānavargyānantaryaṃ sakṛd
GK16jgrasg1u:826: ekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam/ yathā-- “vitathas te manorathaḥ”/ asakṛc ced adhikam/ yathā-- “vitathataraṃ vacanaṃ tava pratīmaḥ”/ evaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:827: bhinnapadagatatve/ yathā-- “atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā” ity ādau/ asakṛd bhinnapadagatatve tu tato 'py adhikam/ “atha tathā kuru yena sukhaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:828: labhe”/ etac ca vargāṇāṃ prathamadvitīyayos tṛtīyacaturthayor ānantaryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:829: prathamatṛtīyayor dvitīyatṛtīyayor vānantaryaṃ tu tathā nāśrāvyam/ kiṃ tv īṣat, nirmāṇamārmikaikavedyam/ etad apy asakṛc cet tato 'dhikatvāt
GK16jgrasg1u:830: sādhāraṇair api vedyam/ yathā-- “khaga kalānidhir eṣa vijṛmbhate”/ “iti
GK16jgrasg1u:831: vadati divāniśaṃ sa dhanyaḥ”/ pañcamānāṃ madhuratvena svavargyānantaryaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:832: na tathā/ yathā-- “tanute tanutāṃ tanau”/ svānantaryaṃ tv aśravyam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:833: yathā-- “mama mahatī manasi vyathāvirāsīt”/ etāni cāśravyatvāni guruvyavāyenāpodyante/ “saṃjāyatāṃ kathaṃkāraṃ kāke kekākalasvanaḥ”/
GK16jgrasg1u:835: “yathā yathā tāmarasāyatekṣaṇā mayā sarāgaṃ nitarāṃ niṣevitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:836: tathā tathā tattvakatheva sarvato vikṛṣya mām ekarasaṃ cakāra sā//”
GK16jgrasg1u:840: idaṃ tu bodhyam-- gurur yayor vyavadhāyakas tayor eva varṇayor
GK16jgrasg1u:842_0: takārathakārānantaryakṛtam aśravyatvam anapoditam eva / evaṃ tryādīnāṃ saṃyogo 'pi prāyeṇāśravyaḥ / “rāṣṭre tavoṣṭryaḥ paritaś
GK16jgrasg1u:842_1: caranti” ity evamādayaḥ śṛutikāṭavabhedā anye 'py anubhavānusāreṇa bodhyāḥ / atha dīrghānantaryaṃ saṃyogasya bhinnapadagatasya
GK16jgrasg1u:842_2: sakṛd apy aśravyam, asakṛt tu sutarām /
GK16jgrasg1u:845_0: ekapadagatasya tu tathā nāśravyatvam / yathā-- “jāgratā vicitaḥ panthāḥ śātravāṇāṃ vṛthodyamaḥ” / parasavarṇakṛtasya tu saṃyogasya
GK16jgrasg1u:845_1: sarvathā dīrghād bhinnapadagatatvābhāvān madhuratvāc cānantaryaṃ na manāg apy aśravyam /
GK16jgrasg1u:846: yathā-- “tāṃtamālatarukānti-” ity ādipadye/ atra tām ity atra nīm ity atra ca parasavarṇasya pūrvapadabhaktatayā na saṃyogo bhinnapadagataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:847: pratyekaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñeti pakṣe 'pi bhinnapadagataḥ saṃyogo na dīrghād
GK16jgrasg1u:848: avyavahitaparaḥ/ navāmbudety atra tv ekādeśasya padadvayabhaktatayā dīrghād bhinnapadagatatve saty avyavahitottaratvaṃ yady api
GK16jgrasg1u:849: parasavarṇakṛtasaṃyogasya bhavati tathāpy atra bhinnapadagatatvam ekapadagatabhinnatvaṃ vivakṣitam ity adoṣaḥ/ asakṛt tu sutarām/ yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:850: “eṣāṃ priyā me kva gatā trapākulā”/ idaṃ cāśravyatvaṃ kāvyasya paṅgutvam iva pratīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:851: atha svecchayā saṃdhyakaraṇaṃ sakṛd apy aśravyam/ yathā-- “ramyāṇi
GK16jgrasg1u:852: indumukhi te kilakiñcitāni/ pragṛhyatāprayuktaṃ tv asakṛd eva/ aho amī indumukhīvilāsāḥ”/ evam eva ca ya-va-lopaprayuktam “apara iṣavaete kāminīnāṃ dṛgantāḥ”/
GK16jgrasg1u:855: tārā iva turagā iva sukhalīnā mantriṇo bhavataḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:856: iti bhavadīyaṃ kāvyam iti ced akṛtvaiva yalopaṃ pāṭhān na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:857: evaṃ rorutvasya hali lopasya yaṇguṇavṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvarūpādīnāṃ naikaṭyena bāhulyam aśravyatāhetuḥ/ evam ime sarve 'py aśravyabhedāḥ kāvyasāmānye varjanīyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:858: atha viśeṣato varjanīyāḥ/ tatra madhuraraseṣu ye viśeṣato varjanīyā anupadaṃ vakṣyante ta evaujasviṣv anukūlāḥ, ye cānukūlatayoktās te
GK16jgrasg1u:859: pratikūlā iti sāmānyato nirṇayaḥ/ madhuraraseṣu dīrghasamāsaṃ jhayghaṭitasaṃyogaparahrasvasya visarjanīyādeśasakārajihvāmūlīyopadhmānīyānāṃ ṭavargajhayāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:860: rephahakārānyataraghaṭitasaṃyogasya halāṃ la-ma-na-bhinnānāṃ svātmanā saṃyogasya jhaydvayaghaṭitasaṃyogasya cāsakṛtprayogaṃ naikaṭyena varjayet/
GK16jgrasg1u:864: sāyāhani praṇayino bhavanaṃ vrajantyāś ceto na kasya harate gatir
GK16jgrasg1u:868: vedhā vidhāya punar uktam ivendubimbaṃ dūrīkaroti na kathaṃ viduṣāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:870: atra bhriśabdaparyantaṃ śṛṅgārānanuguṇam/ śiṣṭaṃ tu ramaṇīyam/ uttarārdhe kakāratakārarūpajhaydvayasaṃyogasya sattve 'pi prācuryābhāvān na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:872: sāndrāmṛtam, ity ādi kriyate tadā sarvam eva ramaṇīyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:878: “kalitakuliśaghātāẖ ke 'pi khelanti vātāḥ kuśalam iha kathaṃ vā jāyatāṃ jīvite me/
GK16jgrasg1u:879: ayam api bata guñjannāli mākandamaulau culukayati madīyāṃ cetanāṃ cañcarīkaḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:880: atra dvitīyajihvāmūlīyaparyantam ananuguṇaṃ mādhuryasya/ yadi ca “kathaya
GK16jgrasg1u:881: katham ivāśā jāyatāṃ jīvite me malayabhujagavāntā vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ”
GK16jgrasg1u:885: capalopamitā khalu svayaṃ yā bata loke sukhasādhanaṃ kathaṃ sā//”
GK16jgrasg1u:886: atra dvāv upadhmānīyāv eva na śāntānuguṇau/
GK16jgrasg1u:888: “vacane tava yatra mādhurī sā hṛdi pūrṇā karuṇā ca komale 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:889: adhunā hariṇākṣi hā kathaṃ vā kaṭutā tatra kaṭhoratāvirāsīt//”
GK16jgrasg1u:890: adhunā sakhi tatra hā kathaṃ vā gatir anyaiva vilokyate guṇānām” iti tv anuguṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:892: tulām anālokya nijām akharvaṃ gaurāṅgi garvaṃ na kadāpi kuryāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:894: yadi tu “tulām anālokya mahītale 'smin” iti nirmīyate tathā sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:896: “vigaṇayya me nikāyyaṃ tām anuyāto 'si naiva tannyāyyam/” la-ma-nānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:897: svātmanā saṃyogas tu na tathā pāruṣyam āvahati/yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:898: “iyam ullasitā mukhasya śobhā pariphullaṃ nayanāmbujadvayaṃ te/
GK16jgrasg1u:899: jaladālim ayaṃ jagadvitanvan kalitaḥ kvāpi kim āli nīlameghaḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:901: “ā sāyaṃ salilabhare savitāram upāsya sādaraṃ tapasā/
GK16jgrasg1u:902: adhunābjena manāk tava mānini tulanā mukhasyāptā//”
GK16jgrasg1u:903: atra dvitīyārdham aramyam/ “sarasijakulena saṃprati bhāmini te
GK16jgrasg1u:906: ayi mandasmitamadhuraṃ vadanaṃ tanvaṅgi yadi manāk kuruṣe/
GK16jgrasg1u:907: adhunaiva kalaya śamitaṃ rākāramaṇasya hanta sāmrājyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:909_0: ka-khasaṃyogasya mahāprāṇasaṃyoganiṣedhaviṣayatvāt tṛtīyasaṃyogasya cāsaṃbhavāt savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyoganiṣedho niravakāśa
GK16jgrasg1u:909_1: iti cet, na / sakṛt prayogaviṣayatvenāsya pārthakyāt / ānyathā “manāk kuruṣe” iti nirdoṣaṃ syāt /
GK16jgrasg1u:913: evaṃ tvapratyayaṃ, yaṅantāni, yaṅalugantāny anyāni ca śābdikapriyāṇy api madhurarase na prayuñjīta/ evaṃ vyaṅgyacarvaṇātiriktayojanāviśeṣāpekṣānāpātato 'dhikacamatkāriṇo
GK16jgrasg1u:914: 'nuprāsanicayān yamakādīṃś ca saṃbhavato 'pi kavir na nibadhnīyāt/ yato hi te rasacarvaṇāyām anantarbhavantaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayaṃ svābhimukhaṃ vidadhānā
GK16jgrasg1u:915_0: rasaparāṅmukhaṃ vidadhīran /vipralambhe tu sutarām / yato madhuratamatvenāsya nirmalasitānirmitapānakarasasyeva tanīyān api
GK16jgrasg1u:915_1: svātantryam āvahan padārthaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāruṃtudatayāna sarvathaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyam arhati /
GK16jgrasg1u:919: ye tu punar akliṣṭatayānunnataskandhatayā ca na pṛthag bhāvanām apekṣante,
GK16jgrasg1u:920: kiṃ tu rasacarvaṇāyām eva susukhaṃ gocarīkartuṃ śakyāḥ, na teṣām anuprāsādīnāṃ tyāgo yuktaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:923: āli vidhāya sāyaṃ smerānanā sapadi śīlaya saudhamaulim/
GK16jgrasg1u:924: prauḍhiṃ bhajantu kumudāni mudām udārām ullāsayantu parito harito mukhāni//”
GK16jgrasg1u:925: ittham ete prasaṅgato madhurarasābhivyañjikāyāṃ racanāyāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā doṣāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:926: “ebhir viśeṣaviṣayaiḥ sāmānyair api ca dūṣaṇai rahitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:929: tāṃ vibudhā vaidarbhīṃ vadanti vṛttiṃ gṛhītaparipākām//
GK16jgrasg1u:930: asyām udāhṛtāny eva kiyanty api padyāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:932: “āyātaiva niśā niśāpatikaraiḥ kīrṇaṃ diśām antaraṃ bhāminyo bhavaneṣu bhūṣaṇagaṇair ullāsayanti
GK16jgrasg1u:933: vāme mānam apākaroṣi na manāg adyāpi roṣeṇa te hā hā bālamṛṇālato 'py atitamāṃ tanvī tanus
GK16jgrasg1u:934: asyāś ca rīter nirmāṇe kavinā nitarām avahitena bhāvyam/ anyathā tu paripākabhaṅgaḥ syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:935: “śūnyaṃ vāsagṛhaṃ vilokya śayanād utthāya kiṃcicchanair nidrāvyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham/
GK16jgrasg1u:936: vistrabdhaṃ paricumbya jātapulakām ālokya gaṇḍasthalīṃ lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā//”
GK16jgrasg1u:937: atrotthāya kiṃcicchanair ity atra savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyogas tatrāpi naikaṭyeneti sutarām aśravyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:938: jhayghaṭitasaṃyogaparahrasvasyāpi/ tathā śanair nidrety atra, nirvarṇya patyur mukham ity atra ca rephaghaṭitasaṃyogasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:939: jhayghaṭitasaṃyogaparahrasvasya ca prācuryam/ vistrabdham ity atra
GK16jgrasg1u:940_0: mahāprāṇaghaṭitasya, lajjety atra svātmasavarṇajhaydvayaghaṭitasya, mukhī priyeṇety atra bhinnapadagatadīrghānantarasya saṃyogasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:940_1: tathā ktvāpratyayasya pañcakṛtvaḥ, lokateś ca dhātor dviḥ prayogaḥ kaver
GK16jgrasg1u:943_0: atha bhāvadhvanir nirūpyate / atha kiṃ bhāvatvam / vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatve sati rasavyañjakatvam iti cet, rasakāvyavākye
GK16jgrasg1u:943_1: 'tivyāptyāpatteḥ / arthadvārā śabdasyāpi vyañjakatvāt / dvārāntaranirapekṣatvena vyañjakatve viśeṣite tv asaṃbhavaḥ prasajyeta /
GK16jgrasg1u:943_2: bhāvasyāpi bhāvanādvāraiva vyañjakatvāt, bhāvanāyām ativyāptyāpatteś ca / ata eva ca vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatvasyeva śabdabhinnatvasyāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:943_3: tadviśeṣaṇatve na nistāraḥ / pradhānadhvanyamānabhāve rasavyañjakatābhāvād avyāptyāpatteś ca /
GK16jgrasg1u:944: na ca tatrāpi prānte raso 'bhivyajyata eveti vācyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:945: bhāvadhvanivilopaprasaṅgāt/ bhāvacamatkāraprakarṣād bhāvadhvanitvam/ rasas tu tatra vyajyamāno 'py acamatkāritvān na dhvanivyapadeśahetur ity api na
GK16jgrasg1u:946: śakyaṃ vaditum/ camatkārarahitarasavyaktau mānābhāvāt/ rase hi dharmigrāhakamānenānandāṃśāvinābhāvasya prāg evāvedanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:947: astu vā prādhānyena dhvanyamānasyāpi bhāvasya prānte rasābhivyañjakatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:949: ativyāptiḥ/ tasya vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatve sati rasābhivyañjakatvāt/ nāpi rasābhivyañjakacarvaṇāviṣayacittavṛttitvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:953: ityatra hālāhalasadṛśatvaprakārajñāne ativyāpteḥ/ tasya vipralambhānubhāvatvena rasābhivyañjakacarvaṇāviṣayatvāt, cittavṛttitvāc ca/ nāpy akhaṇḍam/ tattve
GK16jgrasg1u:957_0: harṣādīnāṃ ca sāmājikagatānām eva sthāyibhāvanyāyenābhivyaktiḥ / sāpi rasanyāyeneti kecit / vyaṅgyāntaranyāyenetyapare manyante /
GK16jgrasg1u:957_1: vibhāvānubhāvau cātra vyañjakau / na tv ekasmin vyābhicāriṇi dhvanyamāne vyabhicāryantaraṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:958: vyañjakatayāvaśyam apekṣyate, tasyaiva prādhānyāpatteḥ/ vastutas tu prakaraṇādivaśāt prādhānyam anubhavati kasmiṃś cid bhāve
GK16jgrasg1u:959: tadīyasāmagrīvyaṅgyatvena nāntarīyakatayā tanimānam āvahato vyabhicāryantarasyāṅgatve 'pi na kṣatiḥ/ yathā garvādāv amarṣasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:960: amarṣādau vā garvasya/ na caivaṃ sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvāpattiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:962: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyavyapadeśahetutvāt/ ata eva nāntarīyakasya bhāvasya dhvananaṃ bhavati/ anyathā garvādidhvaner uccheda eva bhavet/
GK16jgrasg1u:963: vibhāvas tv atra vyabhicāriṇo nimittakāraṇasāmānyam/ na tu rasasyeva
GK16jgrasg1u:964: sarvathaivālambanoddīpane apekṣite/ yadi tu kvacit saṃbhavatas tadā na
GK16jgrasg1u:970: etena vātsalyākhyaṃ putrādyālambanaṃ rasāntaram iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:976: tathotpattiś ca putrāder vibhāvo yatra jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:978: aśrusvedādayaś cānubhāvā harṣaṃ tam ādiśet//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:981: avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva//”
GK16jgrasg1u:985: “tanmañju mandahasitaṃ śvasitāni tāni sā vai kalaṅkavidhurā
GK16jgrasg1u:987: adyāpi me hṛdayam unmadayanti hanta sāyaṃtanāmbujasahodaralocanāyāḥ//”
GK16jgrasg1u:988: cintāviśeṣo 'tra vibhāvaḥ/ bhrūnnatigātraniścalatvādaya ākṣepagamyā anubhāvāḥ/ yady apy atrāsyā eva smṛteḥ saṃcāriṇyāḥ, nāyikārūpasya
GK16jgrasg1u:990: vipralambharasābhivyakte rasadhvanitvaṃ śakyate vaktum tathāpi smṛter evātra puraḥsphūrtikatvāc camatkāritvāc ca taddhvanitvam uktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:991_0: tadāder buddhisthaprakārāvacchinne śaktir iti naye buddheḥ śakyatāvacchedakānugamakatayā na vācyatāsaṃsparśaḥ / buddhisthatvaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:991_1: śakyatāvacchedakam iti naye 'pi smṛtitvena smṛter vyaktivedyataiva / tasyāś cātra vākyavedyatve 'pi padasyaiva kurvadrūpatvāt
GK16jgrasg1u:992: etena bhāvānāṃ padavyaṅgatve na vaicitryam iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:996: ity atra smṛtir na bhāvaḥ, svaśabdena nivedanād avyaṅgyatvāt/ nāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:998: smaraṇasyālaṃkāratvam, anyasya tu vyañjitasya bhāvatvam iti siddhāntāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:999: kiṃ tu vibhāva eva sundaratvāt kathaṃcid rasaparyavasāyī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1000: strīṇāṃ puruṣamukhāvalokanādeḥ puṃsāṃ ca pratijñābhaṅgaparābhavāder utpanno vaivarṇyādhomukhatvādikāraṇībhūtaś cittavṛttiviśeṣo vrīḍā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1003: vinihitavadanaṃ māṃ vīkṣya bālā gavākṣe cakitanatanatāṅgī sadma sadyo viveśa//

GK16jgrasg1u:1006: “niruddhya yāntīṃ tarasā kapotīṃ kūjatkapotasya puro dadāne/

GK16jgrasg1u:1008: pūrvatra trāsa ivātrāpi harṣo leśatayā sannapi vrīḍāyā anuguṇa eva/

GK16jgrasg1u:1016: atra kāntaviyogo vibhāvaḥ/ indriyavaikalyaṃ lajjādyabhāvaś cānubhāvaḥ/

GK16jgrasg1u:1024_1: asya dhṛtibhāvadhvanitvam iti cet, tasya dhṛtyupayogitayaivābhivyakteḥ /

GK16jgrasg1u:1041: adhunā mama kutra sā satī patitasyeva parā sarasvatī//”
GK16jgrasg1u:1042: sītāṃ parityaktavato bhagavataḥ śrīrāmabhadrasyeyam uktiḥ/ atra sītāparityāgarūpo 'parādhas tajjanyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1049: atra hatakena mayā vivāsitā na tu vidhinety etasyārthasya patitopamayaiva
GK16jgrasg1u:1050: paripoṣaḥ, na tu śūdrādyupamayā/ yataḥ śūdrasya jātyaiva śrutidaurlabhyaṃ vidhinā kṛtam/ patitasya tu brāhmaṇāder vidhinā śrutisulabhatve svabhāvena
GK16jgrasg1u:1051: kṛte 'pi tenaiva tathāvidhaṃ pāpam ācaratā svataḥ śrutir dūrīkṛteti tasya patitena sāmyam, tasyāś ca śrutyety upamālaṃkāro dainyam evālaṃkurute/
GK16jgrasg1u:1052: tathā mayeti seti copādānalakṣaṇāmūladhvanibhyāṃ kṛtaghnatvakṛtajñātvanirdayatvadayāvatītvādyanekadharmaprakāśanadvārā tad eva paripoṣyate, seti smṛtyā ca leśataḥ pratīyamānayā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1058: adhṛtiś cānubhāvāḥ syuḥ sā cintā parikīrtitā//

GK16jgrasg1u:1064: atra tadaprāptir vibhāvaḥ/ anutāpādaya ākṣepyā anubhāvāḥ/ na cātrautsukyadhvanir iti vācyam/ kasya kṛtaity anirdhāritadharmyālambanāyāś
GK16jgrasg1u:1065: cintāyā eva pratīyamānatayā sato 'py autsukyasyaitadvākyena prādhānyenā 'bodhanāt/

GK16jgrasg1u:1074: “madhurataraṃ smayamānaḥ svasminn evālapañ śanaiḥ kim api/

GK16jgrasg1u:1076_1: madabhāva eva pradhānam iti na svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasyaprādhānyam, api tu taddhvanyupaskārakatvam eva /

GK16jgrasg1u:1080_1: nirūpaṇīye svakarasya tadupameyatayā nirūpaṇaṃ ca madam eva poṣayataḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1085: niḥśvāsairjṛmbhitair mandaiḥ pādotkṣepaiḥ śramo mataḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1087: ayaṃ ca saty api bale jāyate, śārīravyāpārād eva ca jāyate, na tu glāniḥ/

GK16jgrasg1u:1093_1: na kṣamāsīd ity asyānatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ, śīṅābhihitatayā tasyā vyaṅgyatvānupapatteś
GK16jgrasg1u:1097: “ā mūlād ratnasānor malayavalayitād ā ca kūlāt payodher yāvantaḥ santi kāvyapraṇayanapaṭavas te viśaṅkaṃ vadantu/

GK16jgrasg1u:1101_0: puṣṇāti / utsāhapradhāno gūḍhagarvo hi vīrarasadhvaniḥ, ayaṃ tu garvapradhāna iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ / tathā hi vīrarasaprasaṅge

GK16jgrasg1u:1101_2: paripoṣakatayā sthitaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paṇḍitebhyo 'ham adhika iti garvaḥ, na tu prakṛtapadya iva nāsty eva

GK16jgrasg1u:1123: iha tatprabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate//”
GK16jgrasg1u:1125: “hṛdaye kṛtaśaivalānuṣaṅgā muhur aṅgāni yatas tataḥ kṣipantī/

GK16jgrasg1u:1135: ārād upākarṇya giraṃ madīyāṃ saudāminīyāṃ suṣamā mayāsīt//

GK16jgrasg1u:1139: kuru kaśāṃ karābje karuṇāvati kampate mama svāntam/

GK16jgrasg1u:1143: svapna iti yāvat/ asyānubhāvaḥ pralāpādiḥ/ netranimīlanādayas tu nidrāyā

GK16jgrasg1u:1148: tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅ mayety anubhāṣiṇīm/

GK16jgrasg1u:1150: eṣā pravāsagatasya svapne 'pi priyām evaṃbhāṣiṇīṃ dṛṣṭavato nidrāṃ prati kasyacid uktiḥ/ yady apy evaṃbhūtāyāḥ priyatamāvasthāyā nivedanena nidre

GK16jgrasg1u:1444: nanu śabdavācyānāṃ praśamādīnām aruṇakāntyaivānvayāt aruṇakāntipraśamāder eva vācyatvaṃ paryavasitam, na tu tādṛśapraśamādivyaṅgyasya
GK16jgrasg1u:1445: roṣapraśamādeḥ, vyaṅgyavyañjakabhedasyāvaśyakatvāt/ na cāruṇyavyaṅgyaroṣasyaiva vācyībhūtapraśamādyanvaya iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1446: vācyavyaṅgyapratītyor ānupūrvyeṇa siddhatayā vācyānvayabodhavelāyāṃ vācyaiḥ saha vyaṅgyānvayānupapatteḥ/ anyathā “sudṛśo nayanābjakoṇayoḥ” ity asyānvayo na syāt/ maivam/ evam api--
GK16jgrasg1u:1447: “nirvāsayantīṃ dhṛtim aṅganānāṃ śobhāṃ harer eṇadṛśo dhayantyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1449: ityādāv api bhāvapraśamadhvanitvāpatteḥ, bhāvasya vācyatve 'pi pradhānasya tatpraśamasya vyaṅgyatvāt/ ubhayor apy avācyatvam apekṣitam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1451_0: anudāharaṇatvāpatteḥ / iṣṭāpattis tu sahṛdayānām anucitaiva / tasmād bhāvapraśamādiṣv api prādhānyena bhāvānām eva camatkāritvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1451_1: praśamādes tūpasarjanatvam ato na tasya vācyatādoṣaḥ / idaṃ punar bhāvadhvanibhyo
GK16jgrasg1u:1452: bhāvaśāntyādidhvanīnāṃ camatkāravailakṣaṇye nidānam-- yad ekatra carvaṇāyāṃ bhāveṣu sthityavacchinnāmarṣāditvam, amarṣāditvam eva vā
GK16jgrasg1u:1453: prakāraḥ/ anyatra tu praśamāvasthatvādir apīti/ rasasya tu sthāyimūlakatvāt praśamāder asaṃbhavaḥ, saṃbhave vā na camatkāraḥ, iti na sa vicāryate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1454: so 'yaṃ nigaditaḥ sarvo 'pi ratyādilakṣaṇo vyaṅgyaprapañcaḥ sphuṭe
GK16jgrasg1u:1455_0: prakaraṇe jhagiti pratiteṣu vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṣu sahṛdayatamena pramātrā sūkṣmeṇaiva samayeta pratīyata iti hetuhetumatoḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:1455_1: paurvāparyakramasyālakṣaṇād alakṣyakramo vyapadiśyate / yatra tu vicāravedyaṃ prakaraṇam, unneyā vā vibhāvādayas tatra sāmagrīvilambādhīnaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1455_2: camatkṛter māntharyam iti saṃlakṣyakramo 'py eṣa bhavati / yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:1456: “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ” iti prāg udāhṛte padye “saṃprati” ity etadarthāvagatir vilambena/ na khalu dharmigrāhakamānasiddhaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1460: ity atra kumārīsvābhāvyād apy adhomukhatvaviśiṣṭasya līlākamalapattragaṇanasyopapattyā manāgvilambena nāradakṛtavivāhādiprasaṅgavijñānottaraṃ vrīḍāyāś camatkaraṇāl lakṣyakramo
GK16jgrasg1u:1461: 'yaṃ dhvaniḥ” iti prāhur ānandavardhanācāryāḥ/ rasabhāvādir artho dhvanyamāna eva, na vācyaḥ/ tathāpi na sarvo 'lakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ” iti
GK16jgrasg1u:1462: cābhinavaguptapādācāryāḥ/ syād etat, yady ayaṃ rasādiḥ saṃlakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ syāt/ anuraṇanabhedagaṇanaprastāve
GK16jgrasg1u:1463: dvādaśabhedāḥ” ity abhinavaguptoktiḥ, “tenāyaṃ dvādaśātmakaḥ” iti mammaṭoktiś ca na saṃgaccheta, vastvalaṃkārātmanā dvividhena vācyena
GK16jgrasg1u:1465: tribhir upādhibhis traividhyam āpannena ṣaḍātmanā vastvalaṃkārayor iva rasāder apy abhivyañjanād
GK16jgrasg1u:1467: vyajyamāno ratyādiḥ sthāyibhāvo rasībhavati, na saṃlakṣyakramatayā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1469_0: saṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyamānasya ratyādes tu vastumātrataiva, na rasāditvam iti teṣām āśayasya varṇanena na taduktīnāṃ virodhaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1469_1: upapattis tv arthe 'smin vicāraṇīyā / rasabhāvādir artha ity atra rasādiśabdo ratyādiparaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:1470_0: taditthaṃ nirūpitasyāsya rasādidhvaniprapañcasya padavarṇaracanāvākyaprabandhaiḥ padaikadeśair avarṇātmakai rāgādibhiś cābhivyaktim
GK16jgrasg1u:1470_1: āmananti / tatra vākyagatānāṃ padānāṃ sarveṣām api svārthopasthitidvārā vākyārthajñānopāyatve samāne 'pi kurvadrūpatayā camatkārāyogavyavacchinnatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:1471_0: “mandam ākṣipati” ity atra mandam ity asya / racanāvarṇānāṃ tu padavākyāntargatatvena vyañjakatāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭatvam
GK16jgrasg1u:1471_1: eva na tu vyañjakatvam iti yady api suvacam, tathāpi padavākyaviśiṣṭaracanātvena,
GK16jgrasg1u:1472: racanāviśiṣṭapadavākyatvena vā vyañjakatvam iti vinigamanāviraheṇa ghaṭādau daṇḍacakrādeḥ kāraṇatvasyeva pratyekam eva vyañjakatāyāḥ siddhir iti prāñcaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1474_0: rasābhivyañjakatvam, gauravān mānābhāvāc ca / na hi guṇyabhivyañjanaṃ vinā guṇābhivyañjakatvaṃ nāstīty asti niyamaḥ, indriyatraye
GK16jgrasg1u:1474_1: vyabhicārāt / itthaṃ ca svasvavyañjakopanītānāṃ guṇināṃ guṇānām udāsīnānāṃ ca yathā parasparopaśleṣeṇaudāsīnyena vā tattatpramitigocaratā
GK16jgrasg1u:1474_2: tathā rasānāṃ tadguṇānāṃ cābhivyāktiviṣayateti tu navyāḥ / udāharaṇaṃ tu “tāṃ tamāla”
GK16jgrasg1u:1475: ityādi prāg uktam eva vākyasya vyañjakatāyām api “āvirbhūtā yad avadhi”
GK16jgrasg1u:1476: ityādi ca/ prabandhasya tu yogavāsiṣṭharāmāyaṇe śāntakaruṇayoḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1477: ratnāvalyādīni ca śṛṅgārasya vyañjakatvān nidarśanāni prasiddhāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:1478_0: mannirmitāś ca pañja laharyo bhāvasya / padaikadeśasya ca “nikhilam idaṃ jagad aṇḍakaṃ vahāmi” iti karūpataddhito vīrarasasya
GK16jgrasg1u:1478_1: prāg evodāhṛtaḥ / evaṃ rāgādibhir api vyaṅgyatve sahṛdayahṛdayam eva pramāṇam / evam eṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ prādhānyena nirūpitāny
GK16jgrasg1u:1479: nāmāni ca/ tatra prādhānya evaiṣāṃ rasāditvam, anyathā tu ratyāditvam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1480: nāmani rasapadaṃ tu ratyādiparam ity eke/ asty eva rasāditvaṃ, kiṃ tu na
